[h1]The Fury Class Mod[/h1] Supports Color of Madness: Yes Supports Crimson Court: Yes Mod Version: 2.2c Language: English, French , Polish, Korean
[h1]Latest News[/h1]
Mod now supports Color of Madness DLC!
Fury now receives a buff when he crits. (+20% Damage)
2 new Crimson Court trinkets. (Screenshot added!) 1 new Color of Madness trinket. (Screenshot added!)
Color variations added!
Fury has been released!
[h1]Class Introduction[/h1] Another day, another class. This is my sixth class here on the workshop that i've been working on for the past 3 weeks. This mod is pretty much inspired by berserkers and warriors from various games that you are probably thinking of right now, his look was slightly inspired by Darth Malak from the original KOTOR game. The goal with this class was to create a very RNG pure DPS class that can attack multiple times per round based on players luck.
This class has 2 stances, Order and Chaos. You can go into Chaos stance by using "Primal Impulse" it can only be used below 66% health. You can use this same ability to go back to Order stance as long as your health is below 66%. If your health goes above 66% of your maximum health Order stance is automatically activated.
In Order stance, the Fury can increase his protection, debuff enemy damage and stun resistance, as he fights his chance to stun enemies goes up, once his stun chance is high enough, he can stun 2 enemies in the front row.
In Chaos stance, every time the fury attacks he receives an additional free attack that only has an aprox. 40% chance to hit. If that attack hits you get another free attack and lose some health. Your turn is over when your attack misses. In this stance he also builds up bleed skill chance instead of stun skill chance and debuffs enemy bleed resistance and dodge instead of stun resistance, damage and protection. This stance also has a bleed ability that does a decent amount of damage in two rounds and one that amplifies damage done to bleeding targets.
He is a very fun class to play and i think people will enjoy him quite a bit. This class will give opportunities for those "OMG" moments where you get 3 attacks in a row, but the chances of that happening are pretty low. You can expect in most cases to get 2 attacks per round. He also provides free medicinal herbs on every mission and does not like to go to church. As you know balance is very important to me, so don't hesitate to add me on steam to give feedback and help me make Fury as balanced as he can be. You can also post your feedback in the comment section below. Screenshots are there only for visual effect display, nothing more.
